price: Ovo što ti kazujemo jesu ajeti i Opomena potpuna i savršena.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
